abstract: In the continuing saga of Rupert Murdoch’s quest for Dow Jones & Company, perhaps the strangest turn is the rival offer from Brad Greenspan, a former chief executive of Intermix Media, the onetime parent company of the social networking service MySpace.
lead_paragraph: In the continuing saga of Rupert Murdoch’s quest for Dow Jones & Company, perhaps the strangest turn is the rival offer from Brad Greenspan, a former chief executive of Intermix Media, the onetime parent company of the social networking service MySpace.

headline.main: With Dow Jones Bid, MySpace Founder Again Takes on Murdoch
